casebody.data:
BARCLAY PETROLEUM, INC., Appellant,
v.
BAILEY, TRUSTEE, et al., Appellees. No. 2017-1387 Supreme Court of Ohio. Submitted July 17, 2018
Decided December 21, 2018 Organ Cole, L.L.P., Douglas R. Cole, Shawn J. Organ, Columbus, and Joshua M. Feasel, for appellant. Tzangas Plakas Mannos, Ltd., and Joshua E. O'Farrell, Canton, for appellees. Vorys, Sater, Seymour & Pease, L.L.P., Gregory D. Russell, Thomas H. Fusonie, Columbus, Daniel D. Shuey, and Ilya Batikov, Columbus, urging reversal for amici curiae, Ohio Oil and Gas Association and Southeastern Ohio Oil and Gas Association. O'Donnell, Kennedy, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and French and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

*77{¶ 1} The cause is dismissed as having been improvidently accepted.
